Activity: Log in to the QA system, check emails, and review the report feedback from the management team.
Make any final adjustments needed based on management feedback.
Prepare for next week's tasks and prioritize based on current feedback.
Send an update email to the team summarizing this week’s progress and the tasks for next week.
Take time to review personal growth and development through this week’s challenges and achievements.
Wrap up for the week; log off and relax, reviewing the successes of the week.
